room_title: Escape room "The Strange Room" by Kuma Escape in San Jose
review: This room was a great introduction to escape rooms. It's a well done 'basic' escape room that highlights its puzzles. The room doesn't have much story and the focus is on your team working through the puzzles.

room_title: Escape room "The Strange Room" by Kuma Escape in San Jose
review: Had a great time!!! We participated in Stage 1 game - it was hard but it was a lot of thinking and about teamwork. We didn't escape the room in time but we still really enjoyed the experience!

room_title: Escape room "The Strange Room" by Kuma Escape in San Jose

Escape room "The Strange Room" by Kuma Escape in San Jose
review: I RARELY write reviews, but this place is LEGIT!!!! finding clues, solving puzzles, working with your teammates...THE TIME IS TICKING!!This is a GREAT and FUN place to; have fun with your friends, do a leadership activity, do a double/triple date, etc!Nothing, but good things to say about this place! You think there's nothing to do in San Jose? Think again!!! come here! have a blast!!!!!
